## Research Vision

My research focuses on developing safe, adaptable, and trustworthy AI systems for complex, safety-critical environments. I integrate techniques from **physics-informed deep reinforcement learning (DRL)**, **vision-based simulation**, and **large language models (LLMs)** to design AI agents capable of robust decision-making in dynamic cyber-physical systems such as smart energy grids, autonomous vehicles, and robotics. My work bridges real-world system constraints with advanced machine learning to build agents that are not only high-performing, but also interpretable, resilient, and safe.
